q: In a new interview with ex`` American Idol'' judge Simon Cowell , Oprah Winfrey peels away a few layers from this complicated man she calls the world's most famous talent scout. The interview for her new network show called`` Oprah Winfrey Presents Master Class'' delves into Simon Cowell 's childhood and gives him a chance to reflect on why he has become so successful.
